extendedInfo.description: Comprehensive protection from all types of threats for mobile devices with "lifetime" support.Use Dr.Web for Android free of charge.Users of Dr.Web Security Space or Dr.Web Anti-virus are entitled to use Dr.Web for Android (comprehensive protection) FREE OF CHARGE. Features and Advantages â¢	Quick or full file system scanning, as well as custom scanning of files and folders specified by the user.â¢	Real-time file system scanning with SpIDer Guard monitor whenever attempts are made to save files to the deviceâs memory.â¢	Detection of new, unknown malware using the unique Origins Tracingâ¢ technology. â¢	Protects the SD card from becoming infected with autorun and Exploit.Cpllnk files, which can be dangerous for devices running Windows.â¢	A quarantine to which detected threats can be moved and from which files can be restored.â¢	Minimal impact on OS performance. â¢	Careful use of battery resources. â¢	Small-sized virus database updates to save traffic, which is especially important users with limited mobile phone plans.â¢	Statistics on detected threats and actions performed.â¢	Handy and informative desktop widgets to access the application. Anti-spamto avoid unwanted calls and SMS messages.â¢	Select the calls and messages filtering mode.â¢	Create your own filtering profiles.â¢	Edit your black list (block incoming calls and messages from certain numbers).â¢	View blocked calls and messages. Anti-theftHelps you find your mobile device if it has been lost or stolen and, if necessary, will wipe your confidential information from the device remotely. â¢	Device blocking after a rebootâ¢	Lock the device so that it can be unlocked only by entering a password (limit the number of unlock password enter errors)â¢	Unlock the device with an SMS message.â¢	View the device's location on Google Maps.â¢	Remotely erase data on the device and SD card.â¢	Set the deviceâs speakerphone volume to loud and lock the screen.â¢	Customize the message to be displayed on the screen of the blocked device. â¢	Create a list of numbers to which notifications will be sent when the SIM card on the lost device is changed.  You will be able to control the anti-theft by sending messages from these numbers and unlock the device if you have forgotten the unlock password.Cloud CheckerCloud Checker will protect you from unwanted Internet resources. Block access to non-recommended or potentially dangerous sites in the following categories:â¢	Drugs and narcotics;â¢	Known sources of viruses ;â¢	Abusive language;â¢	Terrorism;â¢	Violence;â¢	Weaponsâ¢	Adult content, etc.How to remove Dr.Web for Android with installed anti-theft  Before removing the Dr.Web anti-virus, go to Administration. Under Security, clear the Dr.Web Anti-virus option.

reviews.title: Started out dubious, maybe staying that way, maybe not.
reviews.comment: My Samsung Galaxy 7.7 seemed to be a little sluggish and erratic after I first installed it but the scanner apparently just needed some time to get used to my system. It usually only slightly delays things but sometimes it\'s not slightly. I just hope it\'s actually doing what it says it\'s doing when I install apps, etc. I didn\'t appreciate the \"Cloud Checker\" all of a sudden blocking access to important sites that there is no reason to block access to and that it wasn\'t told to block. (I turned \"cloud checking\

reviews.title: Best antivirus by far.
reviews.comment: It is definitely worth every penny! I know that my phone is protected. Dr. Web lets me know immediately if an app is a threat and removes it. It will transfer to any phone I get (as long as it is an android). It\'s the only antivirus I\'ll use for my phone.
reviews.author: Jennifer Isakson

reviews.title: needs a little work
reviews.comment: Love the app for safety but I bought the pro version thinking I would have options to block calls and texts, however, it\'s only for numbers you list which is disappointing. it needs more options on that, like selecting your contact list as okay and a general block private or 800 numbers. If I manually have to list calls to block then it\'s pretty much a useless feature.
reviews.author: A Google User
